text:
Hello,
How I can upload attachments in <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/contacts> to this API?
I mean you could make separate lists for separate scores
Lists tool is just for segmentation and potential targeting through emails. The reporting tool would show you a count, average etc.
Alternatively, for this data type you could use the feedback submission api and add the column “last nps survey rating” to your list.

Hi everyone,
we have ran into an issue with the events API. We request the events recursively and count the unique events that are open. The number we get this way does not match the open events value on the user interface. Do you know if there is a better way to retrieve this data?

 We have posted the question <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/The-returned-number-of-quot-open-events-quot-for-emails-do-not/m-p/829129#M66179|here>, as well.

Hi everyone,

Is there an api to get the schema of deal object without requiring the custom.schema.read permission. I just want to take deals read permission and nothing else. I am looking at `v3/schemas/deal`  but this requires a custom.schema.read permission
Curious to other opinions as well!

hi everyone , I wanted to bring up an issue I raised regarding the HubSpot API in Python. I posted the question, but it seems like there haven't been any updates or responses yet. I was wondering if anyone here might have some insights or ideas about it.
Here's the link to the question for your reference: <https://github.com/HubSpot/HubSpot-api-python/issues/232>
yes, you can get the standard objects from the schema endpoints but only if you have the custom object read/schema OAuth scopes

Hi team, I am trying to query v3 api of call  */crm/v3/objects/calls*<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/contacts|s> . I am planning to query some associations data too which in older api looked like this:
So how do I pull it in new v3 api

Hello :wave:

I'm a PM in HubSpot's developer product group and want to chat with a handful of devs regarding their overall workflow/"dev-ops" process. Focused mainly on HubSpot integration/customization work and would like to learn about the stack and tools you use, why you use them, and how they impact (_perceived or measured_) your productivity as a HubSpot developer.

If you're up for a ~30-minute chat, be it async or <https://meetings.HubSpot.com/casey-iannone|zoom>, feel free to shoot me a dm or drop a line in the

hey guys! does anyone know if it’s possible for me to set a workflow to trigger any time an email is received at my email address? I realize that zappier can be used for this in many cases, but hoping to use my HubSpot account to trigger some flows. need to get a webhook to send to my api

Hi all, we are trying to retrieve hidden files using the API call <https://api.hubapi.com/filemanager/api/v2/files/{attachmentid}>.

If the file is hidden, the URL does not provide us access to the file. Has anyone come up with a workaround for this? Thank you

How to copy my email templates from one account to another account ?
copy my email templates from novatr to test sandbox account
Hey guys!,  does anyone know how to get all default + custom objects using api call ?
